One of my favorite two restaurants in Barcelona (other is Passadis del Pep).  The atmosphere in here is great: an upscale Bodega or Vinoteca. The predominately seafood selection is very fresh.  The open kitchen sens delicious aromas into the mostly bar-seated restaurant.The wine is..... Well, the writing... I mean the wine is on the wall. Spanish trophies are avaiable for a pittance, if that's your thing.  It IS mine.
